video.title: Falling in Love Like a Romantic Drama
video.synopsis: Naomi Watanabe hosts a reality show in which eight young actors perform kissing scenes in a drama. Then the camera follows them to see if sparks fly!

episodes.synopsis: Will real love blossom on the set of a romantic drama? Eight aspiring actors select their training partners ahead of the first episode's audition.
episodes.title: act.1

episodes.synopsis: The next episode tells a tale of childhood friends becoming lovers. To emulate a close bond, the boys take the girls to places from their youth.
episodes.title: act.2

episodes.synopsis: The auditions for the second episode begin. Feelings of love and passion for acting meld together as the winning pair shares a nervous kiss.
episodes.title: act.3

episodes.synopsis: After the girls select their secret date partners, a love triangle emerges. One boy can't stop smiling as the pairs for the third episode are chosen.
episodes.title: act.4

episodes.synopsis: Afraid of being the only pair not included in the scene, the actors prepare themselves. Later, a surprising atmosphere develops during the shoot.
episodes.title: act.5

episodes.synopsis: During a summer training camp, the girls confess their romantic feelings. Later, the pairs are chosen by the acting instructor instead of the actors.
episodes.title: act.6

episodes.synopsis: The script calls for three actors to play a couple and a spurned lover. The selected cast members deliver raw, emotional performances.
episodes.title: act.7

episodes.synopsis: The actors feel conflicted after learning they must decide their partners through group discussion. Later, Ms. Sawada assigns another surprising task.
episodes.title: act.8

episodes.synopsis: The group celebrates with the chosen pair. However, on the day of the shoot, the actors discover that the script contains a cruel twist.
episodes.title: act.9

episodes.synopsis: The girls bare their souls in their heartfelt final confessions. Only couples with mutual feelings will be able to perform the last unscripted scene.
episodes.title: act.10

episodes.synopsis: As the second season begins, so do new romances between eight hopeful actors. Love seems to bloom quickly after a tense first encounter and audition.
episodes.title: act.1

episodes.synopsis: In order to fuel the passion required for the next episode's roles as former lovers, the boys take the girls on dates to memorable locations.
episodes.title: act.2

episodes.synopsis: The second episode's audition calls for three performers. One actor confirms his feelings before the leads share a passionate kiss in a laundromat.
episodes.title: act.3

episodes.synopsis: After spending time with their chosen partner on secret dates, the girls are then instructed to choose new partners for the third episode's audition.
episodes.title: act.4

episodes.synopsis: The spurned female lead goes on a double date with her ex-crush and their partners. Hayato Komori from Generations joins the hosts as a special guest.
episodes.title: act.5

episodes.synopsis: During the interim confession at a hot springs training camp, one person's actions bring all the girls to tears and have dramatic consequences.
episodes.title: act.6

episodes.synopsis: Following the show's biggest incident yet, each pair deals with complex emotions as they prepare to audition for an open-air bath scene.
episodes.title: act.7

episodes.synopsis: A special guest joins to offer some advice to the actors. Plus, Ms. Sawada reveals that their auditions will be judged differently than usual.
episodes.title: act.8

episodes.synopsis: The audition results are announced after the poll. The leads, chosen by an overwhelming majority, express their emotions with a passionate kiss.
episodes.title: act.9

episodes.synopsis: Left to decide their own pairs through group discussion, the members clash over their personal feelings. Later, Ms. Sawada delivers another surprise.
episodes.title: act.10

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the shoot, the actors receive a script with a complex twist ending. The members' emotions peak as the scene heads into the climax.
episodes.title: act.11

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a blank script, the actors learn that only a true couple will be able to share a real kiss. The girls make their fateful confessions.
episodes.title: act.12

episodes.synopsis: In the third season, there is one more boy than usual. Since the extra member will be unable to audition alone, the love contest is sure to heat up.
episodes.title: act.1

episodes.synopsis: To prepare for their roles, the boys invite the girls on dates. The hosts are shocked by the brash attitude one of the girls shows toward her partner.
episodes.title: act.2

episodes.synopsis: In an episode focusing on the love story between a cook and his colleague, a tender kiss aided by some olive oil helps grease the wheels of love.
episodes.title: act.3

episodes.synopsis: During his secret date, Ren attempts to reconcile his one-sided affection. Determined to find a partner for the next scene, Yuta makes his move.
episodes.title: act.4

episodes.synopsis: The third episode's theme is a kiss to convey one's feelings. The pairs rehearse and practice kendo for a scene that will end with a watery kiss.
episodes.title: act.5

episodes.synopsis: The actors head to a training camp in Karuizawa that will focus on their physicality. The girls make their interim confessions to the boys.
episodes.title: act.6

episodes.synopsis: Following the girls' confessions, the members throw themselves into training. Having failed to find a partner, Amon makes a surprising suggestion.
episodes.title: act.7

episodes.synopsis: The pairing order is decided by a swimming competition. After Ms. Sawada explains the selection process, one of the members raises an objection.
episodes.title: act.8

episodes.synopsis: Following the turbulent pairing process, Ms. Sawada announces an unprecedented casting method. The hosts get excited about the guest actor.
episodes.title: act.9

episodes.synopsis: The members use the time before the final shoot to talk privately. After everyone lets out their thoughts, their training takes an uncomfortable turn.
episodes.title: act.10

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Sawada reveals that the lead roles will be decided by a vote. Later, the most moving kiss in the show's history leads to tears even in the studio.
episodes.title: act.11

episodes.synopsis: The time for the confessions has finally come. The boys wait by the lake for the girls to approach them and reveal their sincere romantic feelings.
episodes.title: act.12
